TopicTitle: Extremely easy to fly plane I built

Articles.Content:
Here is a really easy to fly plane that is also pretty long range. While messing around with it I was able to cover almost 300,000km and still have a tank and a half of fuel. Here is a video of this plane in action: [http://youtu.be/GIERzY1y8m4](https://youtu.be/GIERzY1y8m4)

\*edit The video is uploading, will be ready in about a half hour.
It\'s not really worth showing us how easily it can pitch upwards. You have to show some turning!
Ok, I will take some video of it turning, I was able to fly out about 130,000 km and land back at the Space Center with it.
You mean 130,000 **meters**  right? If not, then, well, you\'ve got a god-plane.

wow - I\'m new to planes (aren\'t we all) so I searched this forum for an easy plane. It really is easy to fly!! Take off is a piece of cake and it flies straight and level.

Nice job.
